pages.text: This rare and difficult-to-cultivate flower is a harbinger and conduit of lunar energy, truly a nocturnal guardian of any garden. $(br2)Extinct in the wild, it can nonetheless be obtained by a sufficiently skilled wizard through the performance of a $(l:rituals/natural_invocation/moonlight_flower_creation)special ritual$(). At its core, a more common species – the $(l:plants/sunlight_flower)Sunlight Flower$(/l) – will be transformed.
Ritual circles will help convert the flower's magic, turning it away from the Sun and towards the Moon.

pages.title: On Cultivation
pages.text: As previously mentioned, this flower is not easy to care for. First and foremost, it grows only at night and only under the open sky. If the plant is deprived of access to the sky (even during the day), it will instantly perish. Moreover, its growth cannot be accelerated with bone meal, and it proceeds rather slowly at its own pace. Patience will be rewarded!
